Iâ€™m convinced the thought that fills my mind most of the time is just a complex of [reactions](reactions.md) to the strange world Iâ€™m living in. Creative [urges](urges-1.md) struggle to redirect my mind to what I donâ€™t see, to what might be.

So I just finished reading an article about the downside of advertising. I agreed with much of what it said until I came to the money shot. A simple text link led to the author's other side - a site selling various professional services. He went on to say that his form of advertising was a better form than *advertising.* Though I actually agree, itâ€™s still advertising. Itâ€™s commercial, not personal. My concept of *commercial* is probably different than that of most people.
I want to deal with whatâ€™s possible, not wallow is whatâ€™s already taken place and left its ugly mark.
